Author email May 5, 2025 May 5, 2025Updated3 hrs ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Rendering of the 2025 St. Jude Dream Home in Belden, MS. Source: St. Jude. Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Purchase a $100 ticket for a chance to win the 2025 Tupelo St. Jude Dream Home and other awesome prizes. Every $100 ticket helps ensure families never receive a bill from St. Jude for treatment, travel, housing or food — so they can focus on helping their child live. Call1-800-456-8351or visitDreamHome.orgto purchase a ticket. About the Dream Home Address -3292 Summerlin Drive, Belden, MS 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms 2,618 estimated square feet Equipped with smart home technology Upgraded kitchen with walk-in pantry Large bonus room for entertaining Primary bath featuring a steam shower Estimated value - $466,000 Construction company -Tucker Construction Important Dates Tickets go on sale - June 12 Open house dates - Aug. 23 to Sept. 21; Saturdays: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.; Sundays: noon to 5 p.m. Giveaway date - Sept. 25 (live giveaway on WTVA 9 News at 4 p.m.) Other Prizes Tickets on Sale Prize - Purchase a ticket on June 12 for a chance to win a Honey diamond ring, courtesy ofVan Atkins Jewelers. Honey diamond ring, courtesy ofVan Atkins Jewelers. Early Bird Prize - Purchase a ticket by July 11 for a chance to win a $10,000 gift card to Brooks Grocery, courtesy ofBrooks Grocery. Bonus Prize - Purchase a ticket by Aug. 8 for a chance to win a $10,000 Visa gift card, courtesy ofDream Day Foundation. Open House Prize - Register for free at the house (from Aug. 23 to Sept. 21; Saturdays: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.; Sundays: noon to 5 p.m.) for a chance to win a $10,000 shopping spree to Staggs Interiors, courtesy ofStaggs Interiors. Open this link to view FAQs. WTVA interviewed several individuals at St. Jude about how public donations go a long way in helping families.
